actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Transportation and Hazardous Materials

official_title: To prohibit the introduction of a plastic container into interstate commerce that is not labeled to indicate the type of plastic resin used to produce the container.

summary.text: Plastic Container Labeling Act of 1989 - Prescribes labeling requirements for plastic containers in interstate commerce to indicate the type of plastic resin used to produce the container. Imposes criminal penalties for violations. Preempts any less stringent inconsistent State law.

titles.title: To prohibit the introduction of a plastic container into interstate commerce that is not labeled to indicate the type of plastic resin used to produce the container.
